content: {A得意}Feel free to come over to my place whenever! I gotta go take care of something else now... <style=SizeSmall>Bhan... where did I put that blueprint...</style>
info: NPC装修任务 - 巴彦 - 黑屏和表达感谢_巴彦三月版本

content: All I need now is a big, meaty stew. Hmm, speaking of food... Wait, I haven't eaten a single meal today!
info: NPC装修任务 - 巴彦 - 黑屏和表达感谢_巴彦三月版本

content: Mhm, lamp here... shine some light into the gap and... Aha! Knew you were hiding there! Little pebbles, you're all under arrest! Alright, all clear now.
info: NPC装修任务 - 巴彦 - 黑屏和表达感谢_巴彦三月版本

content: {A开心}Perfection! There's no better word! The furniture's exactly where they should be, and I'm sprawled out on the sofa.
info: NPC装修任务 - 巴彦 - 黑屏和表达感谢_巴彦三月版本

content: The table goes here, so after finishing one meal... I can move right on to the next. Bhan! Little pebble! You're under arrest!...
info: NPC装修任务 - 巴彦 - 黑屏和表达感谢_巴彦三月版本

content: You could maybe place the photo on the table, just d—don't put it by the bed! You'll get hungry if you see it in the middle of the night...
info: NPC装修任务 - 巴彦 - 黑屏和表达感谢_巴彦三月版本

content: I can't treat you to anything right now, {A心虚目移}but to make up for it, have this <style=Highlight>photo</style>. At least it's got some stewed meat...{短暂停} well, the smell of it, on there.
info: NPC装修任务 - 巴彦 - 黑屏和表达感谢_巴彦三月版本
